entry.content:
Cerbos 0.40.0

View the full release notes at https://docs.cerbos.dev/cerbos/latest/releases/v0.40.0.html

Changelog

Features

  • 18f8e375f80ad9055d58902ca0de6aee424f7701 feat(plan): Add support for role policies (#2341)

  • 0ead3bea607f0fff683a00ad99a503e9702489b1 feat: Define constants for use in condition expressions (#2364)
  • 2856d7d72ab28668b264d599a84427fe70c7361d feat: Multiple principals and/or resources in a test case (#2338)
  • fcc3e754c1e34003a033fcab869923487c50497a feat: Support constants in cerbosctl (#2365)
  • ee13be08f0a50f0e44ce3fc1cff1908094071355 feat: Use groups of principals and/or resources in test cases (#2340)

Enhancements
